scripts.deploy: npm run resize-images; npm run build; git add ./docs/.; git commit -m "New Deploy: `date`"; git push
scripts.resize-images: identify -format '%w %h %i\n' ./static_asset/products_images/*.jpg | grep --invert-match '500 500' | awk '{print $3}' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 mogrify -verbose -resize '490x490' -extent '500x500'
scripts.upload-images: npm run resize-images; cp -u ./static_asset/products_images/*.jpg ./docs/products_images/;git add ./docs/products_images/.;git commit -m "Upload new image";git push
